# SPECIAL NOTE: 
#	The order and system naming convention used here has been altered from the vanilla naming  
#	convention because of the possibility of additional automatically generated systems.  Most 
#	vanilla systems are still present in this list.  Exceptions are those that come later due 
#	to final_frontier's monster expansion system.


### Privateer Conglomerate
hostile_home_init_1 = {

	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_0 }
		}

		has_ring = no

		init_effect = {
			create_pirate_country = yes
			event_target:pirate_country = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_modifier = pirate_power
						}
					}

				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					set_fleet_flag = pirate_home_system_fleet
					while = {
						count = 1
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Pirate Galleon"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}

			create_fleet = {
				name = "Scarred Veterans"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					set_fleet_flag = pirate_home_system_fleet
					while = {
						count = 6

					}

		base = 10

			factor = 0

		}

						init_effect = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Mining_Corps"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:drone_country
					while = {
						count = 12

						}

					}

					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 200
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:drone_country
					while = {
						count = 10
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
						}
					}
					set_location = {
						target = prev
						distance = 20
						angle = 180
					}
					set_formation_scale = 2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 200
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = event_target:ore_grinder }
				}
				set_planet_flag = ore_grinder_planet
				orbital_deposit_tile = {
					clear_deposits = yes
					add_deposit = d_enormous3_mineral_deposit
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Central_Processing"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						create_ship = {
							name = "NAME_Ore_Grinder"
							design = "NAME_Drone_Home_Base"
							graphical_culture = "drone"
						}
						set_location = prev
						save_event_target_as = ore_grinder
						set_fleet_flag = ore_grinder
					}
				}
				else = {
					create_mining_station = {
						owner = event_target:drone_country
					}
				}
			}
		}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "Asset Protection Unit"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 7
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Combat Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Mining Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Combat Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

### Pirate System 1
hostile_init_001 = {
	class = sc_m
	asteroids_distance = 75
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_0 }
		}
	}



	flags = { pirate_system pirate_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 2 max = 4 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
				init_effect = {
			create_pirate_country = yes
			
			create_fleet = {
				name = "Pirate Hideout"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					create_ship = {
						name = random
						design = "Pirate Hideout"
						graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
					}
					set_location = prev
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "Lookouts"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					while = {
						count = 12
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Brigand"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 20
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Skull"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					set_location = prev
				}
			}
		}


	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { asteroids can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17

			count = 1
			class = "pc_greenhouse_icy"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }

		moon = {
			count = 1

### Pirate System 2
hostile_init_002 = {
	class = sc_g
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_0 }
		}
	}



	flags = { pirate_system pirate_2 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 30
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
				init_effect = {
			create_pirate_country = yes
			event_target:pirate_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Pirate_Fleet"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = Reaver
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = Hunter
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = Vagabond
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "Corsair"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "Marauder"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = random
								design = "Black Earl"
								graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
							}
						}
						set_location = prevprev
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}


	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }

			count = 1
			class = "pc_greenhouse_icy"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_greenhouse_icy"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}

			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 6

			flags = { second }

		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		count = 6

		orbit_distance = 0

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"

						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = rl_ff_jovian_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = rl_ff_jovian_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 39
		has_ring = no
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 6
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0

							count = 8

								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

###########################################################
#O Type with Accretion features. Details:
#	 6 inner and 5 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 10 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_013 = {
	class = sc_o
	asteroids_distance = 165
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 30


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_2 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 39
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 120

	Planet = {
		count = 6
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_molten"
		orbit_distance = 15
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { asteroids second }
	}

	change_orbit = 15

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 6 max = 8 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_gas_giant_hot"
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes

				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station

					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"

							}
						}

							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150

							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

	class = sc_b
	asteroids_distance = 293

	usage_odds = 185

		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 36
		has_ring = no
	}

		count = 5
		class = random_asteroid

		count = 1:
		class = star

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#B Type with Accretion features. Details:
#	 5 inner and 5 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 9 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_020 = {
	class = sc_b
	asteroids_distance = 220
	usage = misc_system_init

		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0

	}

		count = 5

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = rl_ff_jovian_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ringed_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

hostile_init_025 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 145
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 642


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 4
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0

		flags = { first }

#A Type with Accretion features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_026 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 109
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 642


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 4
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_molten"
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { asteroids second }
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 4 max = 6 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_molten"
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { asteroids }
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 4 max = 8 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 5 max = 9 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { asteroids }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_molten"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 234

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0

		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18

						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country

							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}

							}
						}

						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		moon = {

			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 185
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_gas_giants
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first first first first }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0

		count = 1

	change_orbit = 22

		count = { min = 5 max = 9 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

							}
						}

						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			limit = { is_star = no }

				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_greenhouse_icy"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_cold_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

		change_orbit = 17

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second second }

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 5, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_054 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 185
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_destroyer_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_gas_giants
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first first first first }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

	change_orbit = 22

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 5, 6)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_055 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_destroyer_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1

			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}
