		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			flags = { first first first first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		change_orbit = 8

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

		}

						set_location = PREVPREV

						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 151

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {

		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_071 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_2 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0

		change_orbit = 8

	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_frosty_terrestrial
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_greenhouse_icy"
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

hostile_init_072 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 111
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_2 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_temperate_planets_young
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 4 max = 8 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { asteroids can_terraform }

			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1

			orbit_distance = 0

			flags = { first first first }

			count = 1

		moon = {

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 6, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_074 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 151
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_2 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second second second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 171
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3

		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second second second second }

			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 4, 5)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials;

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 5, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_078 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 133
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0

		}

		count = 1:

		size = 33
		has_ring = no

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		count = 1
		class = "pc_molten"

		flags = { first }
	}

	change_orbit = 18

	Planet = {
		count = 4
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0

	class = sc_f
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#	Additional Features:  Brownian Giant;

			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	}

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6

		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#	Additional Features:  Brownian Giant;

	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 188
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		}
	}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_iced_ocean"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second limited_terraform second second }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	class = sc_f
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_destroyer_system }

		count = 1:

		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

###########################################################
#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 1)
#	Additional Features:  Brownian Giant; 

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

###########################################################
#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 3)
#	Additional Features:  Brownian Giant; 

hostile_init_089 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 174
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2


	flags = { hostile_system drone_destroyer_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second }
		change_orbit = 8

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_brownian_giant"
		orbit_distance = 60
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {

			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:

	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 199
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 6


	flags = { hostile_system drone_destroyer_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

###########################################################
#F Type with WarmLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: -1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_091 = {
	class = sc_f
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0

		count = 1

		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1

			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

hostile_init_095 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 175
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_gas_giants
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }

		moon = {

			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }

	}

	change_orbit = 32

	Planet = {

		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

###########################################################
#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 3)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

###########################################################
#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 4)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_098 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 169
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: -1)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_100 = {
	class = sc_f
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0

hostile_init_101 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 99
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second }
		change_orbit = 8

	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 129
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second second }
		change_orbit = 8

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#F Type with WarmLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 5)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_103 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 149
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"

#F Type with TemperateLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: -1)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_104 = {
	class = sc_f
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_temperate_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }

	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_frosty_terrestrial
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#F Type with TemperateLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 3)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_105 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 96
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_temperate_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform second }
		}
	}

	change_orbit = 25

	Planet = {
		count = { min = 4 max = 6 }
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform asteroids }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

hostile_init_106 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 123
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0

			flags = { first first first }
		}
	}

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 17
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen_large"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

###########################################################
#F Type with TemperateLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: 5)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_107 = {
	class = sc_f
	asteroids_distance = 143
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first first first first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second second second second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first first first first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_temperate_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform asteroids }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform first first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second can_terraform second second second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform asteroids }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform first first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 4

###########################################################
#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:
#	 3 inner and 3 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 5 (Iteration: -1)
#	Additional Features:  Frosty Terrestrials; 

hostile_init_108 = {
	class = sc_f
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 1


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 31
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 20

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_extreme_planets
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { first }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { second }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_semi-cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first can_terraform }
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 8
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { first }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen_dwarf"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			flags = { second }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#F Type with CoolLife features. Details:
